results.title: Pharmacologic ACE-Inhibition Mitigates Radiation-Induced Pneumonitis by Suppressing ACE-Expressing Lung Myeloid Cells.
results.journal: Int J Radiat Oncol Biol Phys
results.text_hl: RESULTS: In both the partial body irradiation and fractionated @DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@radiation@@@ therapy models, @DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@radiation@@@ increased ACE activity in lung immune cells. Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ improved survival during @<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Pneumonitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017564 @@@radiation pneumonitis@@@ (P = .0004).
